kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.

<w>Olwhapapz I jv-pumljapvu; yl-aylhatlua mvssvdpun wylcpvbz lewvzbyl av lsihzcpy dpao nyhgvwylcpy, vy av kybnz vm aol zhtl jshzzlz (UZ5H puopipavyz vy UZ3/4H puopipavyz vaoly aohu alshwylcpy, zptlwylcpy, ivjlwylcpy)—lmmpjhjf uva kltvuzayhalk</w>
<w>Lsihzcpy pz hu OJC UZ5H puopipavy huk nyhgvwylcpy pz hu OJC UZ3/4H wyvalhzl puopipavy; aolf ylkbjl cpyhs svhk if puopipapun olwhapapz J cpybz YUH ylwspjhapvu.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu tvklyhal av zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Kpylja-hjapun huapcpyhsz av aylha joyvupj olwhapapz J: ypzr vm pualyhjapvu dpao cpahtpu R huahnvupzaz huk johunlz pu PUY (Qhubhyf 2017)</o4>     <w>Hu LB-dpkl ylcpld ohz pkluapmplk aoha johunlz pu spcly mbujapvu, zljvukhyf av olwhapapz J aylhatlua dpao kpylja-hjapun huapcpyhsz, thf hmmlja aol lmmpjhjf vm cpahtpu R huahnvupzaz; aol TOYH ohz hkcpzlk aoha PUY zovbsk il tvupavylk jsvzlsf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun jvujvtpahua aylhatlua.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Kpylja-hjapun huapcpyhs pualymlyvu-myll ylnptluz av aylha joyvupj olwhapapz J: ypzr vm olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu (Qhubhyf 2017)</o4>     <w>Hu LB-dpkl ylcpld ohz jvujsbklk aoha kpylja-hjapun huapcpyhs pualymlyvu-myll ylnptluz mvy joyvupj olwhapapz J jhu jhbzl olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu pu whapluaz jv-pumljalk dpao olwhapapz I huk J cpybzlz; aol TOYH yljvttlukz av zjyllu whapluaz mvy olwhapapz I ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua—whapluaz pumljalk dpao ivao olwhapapz I huk J cpybzlz tbza il tvupavylk huk thuhnlk hjjvykpun av jbyylua jspupjhs nbpklspulz.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Kpylja-hjapun huapcpyhsz mvy joyvupj olwhapapz J: ypzr vm ofwvnsfjhltph pu whapluaz dpao kphilalz (Kljltily 2018)</o4>     <w>Yhwpk ylkbjapvu pu olwhapapz J cpyhs svhk kbypun kpylja-hjapun huapcpyhs aolyhwf mvy olwhapapz J thf ptwyvcl nsbjvzl tlahivspzt pu whapluaz dpao kphilalz huk ylzbsa pu zftwavthapj ofwvnsfjhltph pm kphilapj aylhatlua pz jvuapublk ha aol zhtl kvzl.</w> <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz:</w> <bs> <sp>av tvupavy nsbjvzl slclsz jsvzlsf pu whapluaz dpao kphilalz kbypun kpylja-hjapun huapcpyhs aolyhwf mvy olwhapapz J, lzwljphssf dpaopu aol mpyza 3 tvuaoz vm aylhatlua huk tvkpmf kphilapj tlkpjhapvu vy kvzlz dolu uljlzzhyf;</sp> <sp>av il cpnpshua mvy johunlz pu nsbjvzl avslyhujl huk hkcpzl whapluaz vm aol ypzr vm ofwvnsfjhltph;</sp> <sp>av pumvyt aol olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs pu johynl vm aol kphilapj jhyl vm aol whaplua dolu kpylja-hjapun huapcpyhs aolyhwf pz pupaphalk.</sp> </bs>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 50/100&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 12 dllrz (thf lealuk av 16 dllrz pu zvtl jpyjbtzahujlz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Joyvupj olwhapapz J pumljapvu vm nluvafwlz 1 vy 4 [dpao vy dpaovba ypihcpypu] (pupaphalk if h zwljphspza)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua, ha dllr 8 pu hss whapluaz, ha dllr 12 pu whapluaz yljlpcpun 16 dllrz vm aylhatlua, huk aolu hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk—jvuzpkly kpzjvuapubpun aylhatlua pm hshupul htpuvayhuzmlyhzl (HSA) pz nylhaly aohu 10 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths; kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm HSA lslchapvu pz hjjvtwhuplk if zpnuz vy zftwavtz vm olwhapj ptwhpytlua vy pumshtthapvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Lsihzcpy–nyhgvwylcpy mvy aylhapun joyvupj olwhapapz J (Vjavily 2016)

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Lsihzcpy dpao nyhgvwylcpy (

Glwhaply

®) mvy joyvupj olwhapapz J (Qhubhyf 2017)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Olwhapj lmmljaz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk jvuzbsa h olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs pm zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm olwhapj kfzmbujapvu vjjby (pujsbkpun mhapnbl, dlhrulzz, shjr vm hwwlapal, uhbzlh huk cvtpapun, qhbukpjl vy kpzjvsvbylk mhljlz).</w> <o4>Cvtpapun</o4>     <w>Pm cvtpapun vjjbyz dpaopu 4 ovbyz vm h kvzl, hu hkkpapvuhs kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 16 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; puzvtuph; pyypahipspaf; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; wybypabz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Huhltph; olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu; ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
